__e: Spend eternity looking for it, never make it to the great white way.
OK, I cannot spend the rest of eternity just... spectating.
Or spend the rest of eternity trying to figure out what happened to the best part of you.
Eternity is too long, And sadly, you're already my husband.
I mean, what do you do when your concept of eternity is wrapped up in a person that doesn't believe in eternity?
Because my soul mate, and the man who I am destined to spend all of eternity with, is a jackass.
Fine, but I'm ok with that because then that means I get to be with you forever, and just the thought of that is good enough for me.
I have an appointment with eternity, and I don't want to be late.
But then I got too scared to die and I just hung there for all of eternity.
In his left hand I saw the sword of the fearful stroke with which he strikes all down to death.
You wanna spend forever somewhere nothing matters?
Well, then it's a good thing we have forever.
If you can't, i hope it doesn't take forever to figure that out.
You and I can spend all of eternity down here hurting each other.

Took me forever to find the courage just to take chances-- whether it's trying to do something that I've never done or-- or saying something that I've always wanted to say, or... doing something crazy for love.
